description: You must purchase the application in order to have and ISALLIC file on your computer. To buy a license, select iSale [version] → Buy iSale... , enter the necessary information, and once you make your purchase, the ISALLIC file will be stored on your computer.

To transfer your license, select iSale [version] → Deactivate iSale... in the application on your old computer, then on the new computer, install iSale, and choose iSale [version] → Activate iSale... .
